title: CS Riven
body: Am i the only one who is against this re release of CS {{champion:92}} ? They clearly said back in S2 that she would not return, this is a blatant lie on Riot's side. Even though we vintage users get a little bonus i'm still angry that they lied back in 2012 about the skin being limited and not returning.

replies.body:
I'm happy with my extra bells and whistles. 

letting other people be happy with getting a skin they like doesn't hurt me at all. Denying that for the sake of exclusivity is just greedy. 

And it's not like everything riot says is written in stone. People, and companies, can change their mind.
And they said after that that the skin would likely be rereleased at some point in the future.
